name: Hisuian Typhlosion
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: Said to purify lost, forsaken souls with its flames and guide them to the afterlife. I believe its form has been influenced by the energy of the sacred mountain towering at Hisui’s center.

abilities.name: Supernatural Orb
abilities.effect: You must discard a {P} Energy card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may make your opponent’s Active Pokémon Burned and Confused.

attacks.name: Shadow Bind
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, the Defending Pokémon can’t retreat.
